channel.title: methyl jasmonate on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in methyl jasmonate on funPlantGenes

item.title: AaWRKY1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AaWRKY1 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 1 Genome: Species: Artemisia annua Functional Descriptions: Isolation and Characterization of AaWRKY1, an Artemisia annua Transcription Factor that Regulates the Amorpha-4,11-diene Synthase Gene, a Key Gene of Artemisinin Biosynthesis.

item.title: CaATL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaATL1 Gene Name: AT-hook-Like gene 1 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: The chili pepper CaATL1: an AT-hook motif-containing transcription factor implicated in defence responses against pathogens.

item.title: CaCIPK3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CA01g29520 Gene Symbol: CaCIPK3 Gene Name: CBL-interacting protein kinase 3 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: The CaCIPK3 gene positively regulates drought tolerance in pepper.

item.title: CaPIF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaPIF1 Gene Name: Pathogen-Induced Factor 1 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: A plant EPF-type zinc-finger protein, CaPIF1, involved in defence against pathogens.

item.title: CrWRKY1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CrWRKY1 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 1 Genome: Species: Catharanthus roseus Functional Descriptions: Promoter analysis reveals cis-regulatory motifs associated with the expression of the WRKY transcription factor CrWRKY1 in Catharanthus roseus.

item.title: GhJAZ2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D06G0810 Gene Symbol: GhJAZ2 Gene Name: jasmonate2 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhJAZ2 attenuates cotton resistance to biotic stresses via the inhibition of the transcriptional activity of GhbHLH171.

item.title: GhMYC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D12G2074 Gene Symbol: GhMYC2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhMYC2 activates cytochrome P450 gene CYP71BE79 to regulate gossypol biosynthesis in cotton.

item.title: JMJ705
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os01g67970 RAPdb gene ID: Os01g0907400 Gene Symbol: JMJ705 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: LeFAD7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeFAD7 Gene Name: omega-3 fatty acid desaturase7 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Loss of Function of FATTY ACID DESATURASE7 (LeFAD7) in Tomato Enhances Basal Aphid Resistance in a Salicylate-Dependent Manner.

item.title: MusaDHN-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MusaDHN-1 Gene Name: SK3-type dehydrin Genome: Species: Musa acuminata Functional Descriptions: MusaDHN-1, a novel multiple stress-inducible SK3-type dehydrin gene, contributes affirmatively to drought- and salt-stress tolerance in banana.

item.title: NtMYBJS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtMYBJS1 Gene Name: Methyl jasmonate induced MYB-related Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: A novel R2R3 MYB transcription factor NtMYBJS1 is a methyl jasmonate-dependent regulator of phenylpropanoid-conjugate biosynthesis in tobacco.

item.title: PgLOX6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PgLOX6 Gene Name: biosynthetic 13-lipoxygenase Genome: Species: Panax ginseng Functional Descriptions: PgLOX6 encoding a lipoxygenase contributes to jasmonic acid biosynthesis and ginsenoside production in Panax ginseng.

item.title: SlWRKY70
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc03g095770.3 Gene Symbol: SlWRKY70 Gene Name: WRKY DNA-binding transcription factor 70 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: SlWRKY70 is required for Mi-1-mediated resistance to aphids and nematodes in tomato.

item.title: SmMYC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SmMYC2 Gene Name: basic helix–loop–helix protein 2 Genome: Species: Salvia miltiorrhiza Functional Descriptions: The SmMYC2–SmMYB36 complex is involved in methyl jasmonate-mediated tanshinones biosynthesis in Salvia miltiorrhiza.

item.title: TaWRKY70
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaWRKY70 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 70 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: There is no direct evidence as to whether WRKY transcription factors play a role in HTSP resistance to Pst.

item.title: VvCAX3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: VvCAX3 Gene Name: Vacuolar cation/H+ exchanger 3 Genome: Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: The grapevine VvCAX3 is a cation/H+ exchanger involved in vacuolar Ca2+ homeostasis.
